FuncDef: The display nat simple-configuration server command displays the configuration of the internal server function in a simplified NAT instance.
Examples: nat server protocol tcp global 10.12.12.12 inside 192.168.12.12
nat server protocol udp global 10.1.1.1 inside 192.168.12.12 redirect 192.168.1.1 inbound
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In the simplified NAT scenario, the internal server function can be configured using the nat server global, nat server protocol, or nat server protocol unnumbered interface command. To view the configuration of the internal server function in a simplified NAT instance, run the display nat simple-configuration server command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
